title: Hidden Magic
description: Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00B0LEP4U.Psychic Jilly Livingston is on the run after stabbing an abusive ex-boyfriend. Now living under a new identity in a spiritualist camp far away, she is hesitant to help sexy detective Zander Parsons find a missing teenager. Although working with a cop jeopardizes her new life, she feels compelled to help the girl who reached out to her through a psychic vision. But when a faceless stalker targets her, she has no choice but to put her trust—and her heart—on the line.
author: Wynter Daniels
